answers.answer: ASHby Darese, 2 minutes agoby Darese, 4 minutes agoTo: AllI was just Dx with NASH grase2- stage 3.  Dr say ther is no tx, just lifestyle change to slow progression.  Anyone with Dx, please let me know your experience.  Thanks Anne for letting me know I was in thw wrong area.

Hi Darese...I hate to have to direct you to move again,however this is a Hepc forum. You would be better to go to the "Liver Disorders forum I have put below.From what i know of NASH and NAFLD(fatty liver ) there is no cure per say,other than first and foremost to lose weight if you are overweight,make sure diabetes is under control,exercise regularly.no alcohol and eat a healthy diet. I also believe your doc is correct in saying there is no cure by meds.Hope that helpsWILL
